title: Interpretation & Understanding: Language & Beyond (Noam Chomsky)
description:
A talk given by Noam Chomsky a few years back at the Coll√®ge de France. He discusses, among other things, what he calls Plato's problem, Orwell's problem, and Descartes' problem, particularly with attention to the history of science and intellectual history.

Chomsky on the Limits of Knowledge: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tc1hsQWzUKc

Chomsky-Foucault Debate on Justice & Human Nature: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xpVQ3l5P0A4
